Module schleicher.softwareoneproj

Package schleicher.softwareoneproj

package schleicher.softwareoneproj
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddPart
    This class acts as the controller to the Add Part window, which allows the user to add new parts to the inventory.
    AddProduct
    This class acts as a controller to the add product screen, and supports adding a new product and its associated parts to the inventory.
    HelloApplication
    This class is the main class that starts the program.
    InHouse
    This class extends the Part class, indicating that a part is in-house, and adds a machineID int feature.
    Inventory
    This class acts as a controller for the main screen, and implements functions that allow access and modification of the lists of all the parts and all the products stored in the program.
    ModifyPart
    This class acts as a controller for the Modify Part window, which allows users to modify existing parts
    ModifyProduct
    This class acts as the controller for the Modify Product window, which allows the user modify a product (except for its id)
    OutSourced
    This class extends the Part class, and adds the functionality of identifying a part as OutSourced and as containing a company name field
    Part
    This class is the provided abstract Part class - it includes the basic fields of a part that are inherited by the InHouse and OutSourced objects
    Product
    This class defines the Product fields and includes an internal ObservableList of parts
